highlight.title: Digia Award 2024
highlight.description: Recognized for continuous learning and embodying company values in leadership & software engineering.

experience.summary: Leading 16 engineers across 3 development teams in AI & Automation. Building high-trust teams that deliver complex enterprise automation solutions.

deepDive.context: Promoted to lead the AI & Automation unit. Responsible for team performance, technical direction, and client relationships.
technicalHighlights: Architected PAM unemployment benefit system processing 70k+ applications annually
Established coding standards and review practices across teams

experience.summary: Led development team through critical project phases. Transitioned from individual contributor to team leadership role.

deepDive.context: Promoted to team lead role, responsible for team coordination, technical decisions, and delivery of automation projects.
technicalHighlights: Coordinated team delivery on multiple concurrent projects
Established team processes and code review practices
Mentored junior developers on best practices
leadershipHighlights: Successfully led team through high-pressure delivery phases

experience.summary: Developed RPA and automation solutions for enterprise clients. Built expertise in process automation and system integration.

deepDive.context: Joined Digia to work on enterprise automation solutions. Applied analytical skills from physics background to optimize business processes.
technicalHighlights: Developed Python-based automation pipelines for document processing
Built integrations between legacy systems and modern cloud services

experience.summary: Taught science courses to students, making complex scientific concepts accessible and engaging.

deepDive.context: Part-time teaching role while completing graduate studies. Developed skills in science communication and pedagogy.
technicalHighlights: Designed and delivered science curriculum for various age groups
Adapted teaching methods for remote learning during pandemic

experience.summary: Contributed to space research projects, applying physics knowledge to satellite and space technology development.

deepDive.context: Worked on space research initiatives, combining academic physics background with practical engineering work.
technicalHighlights: Applied computational physics methods to space research
Collaborated with academic and industry partners

experience.summary: Conducted quantum optics research during a 3-month summer internship. Developed computational models for optical systems.

deepDive.context: Summer research internship in quantum optics, gaining hands-on experience in theoretical and computational physics.
technicalHighlights: Developed Python simulations for quantum optical phenomena
Created data analysis pipelines for experimental physics data
Contributed to research publications in quantum optics

philosophy.title: Complexity is the Enemy
philosophy.belief: Every line of code, every process, every meeting should justify its existence. Simplicity isn't about doing lessâ€”it's about enabling more.

philosophy.title: Impact Over Activity
philosophy.belief: I measure success by outcomes: hours saved, reliability achieved, confidence restored. Activity without impact is just motion.

philosophy.title: Quality as a Daily Practice
philosophy.belief: Quality isn't a phase or a gateâ€”it's how you write every function, run every meeting, give every code review. Small disciplines compound.

roots.transferableInsight: Physics taught me to find simple models for complex phenomena. That skill transfers directly to software architecture and organizational design.

education.transferableInsight: Physics taught me to find simple models for complex phenomena. That skill transfers directly to software architecture and organizational design.
highlights: Developed strong analytical and problem-solving skills

highlights: Strong foundation in algorithms and data structures

gasTown.name: Gas Town
gasTown.description: An open-source multi-agent orchestration system for Claude Code where specialized AI agents collaborate to build software.

roles.name: Mayor
roles.description: Orchestrates the swarm, assigns beads, coordinates work

roles.name: Polecats
roles.description: Ephemeral worker agents that spawn, complete a task, and disappear

roles.name: Refinery
roles.description: Processes merge queue, resolves conflicts, ensures quality

roles.name: Witness
roles.description: Monitors agent health, tracks progress, reports completion

timeline.title: Swarm Peak
timeline.description: 6 components merged simultaneously from parallel polecats
